ojc.bain.base

Class ConfigurableComponentCollection<C extends ComponentConfiguration>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amd.aparapi.Kernel
      • ojc.bain.base.ComponentCollection
        • ojc.bain.base.ConfigurableComponentCollection<C>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, ComponentConfigurationListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NeuronCollection, SynapseCollection

    public abstract class ConfigurableComponentCollection<C extends ComponentConfiguration>
extends ComponentCollection
implements ComponentConfigurationListener

    Base class for all collections of configurable neural network components. A ConfigurableComponentCollection may reference zero, one or more ComponentConfigurations by adding them via addConfiguration(ComponentConfiguration). Each component in the collection may use one of these configurations, this is set via setComponentConfiguration(int componentIndex, int configurationIndex).

    See ComponentCollection for details on implementing component collections.

    Author:
    Oliver J. Coleman

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Description copied from class: ComponentCollection
        Initialise the collection. This method should be called from a sub-classes constructor. Sub-classes should override this method to generate pre-calculated values used during the simulation, and call this super-method. Arrays/buffers initialised here and used in the run() method/kernel should be transferred to the execution hardware using put().
        Overrides:
        init in class ComponentCollection
